column1: in memory of dorothy ann schramm -- jeter & son funeral home| dorothy ann schramm. april 24
column5: 2015 biography. dorothy ann schramm was born april 24
column6: 1945 and went to be with her lord june 10
column7: 2015. she was preceded in death by her husband robert allen schramm and 6 siblings. dorothy is survived by her children donnita wilson
column12: and jessica wilson; brothers adrian roman
column14: and harry lee billey; and grandchildren pakanli alverado and samuel ybarra. visitation will begin at 10:00 a. m. and the funeral service will be 11:00 a. m. saturday
column17: at the dallas indian united methodist church
column19: tx 75208. interment will follow at laurel land memorial park.
